title: Yoweri Museveni
summary: Gen. (Rtd) Yoweri Kaguta Tibuhaburwa Museveni (born 15 September 1944) is a Ugandan politician and retired senior military officer who is the ninth and current President of Uganda. Yoweri Museveni[1] was involved in rebellions that toppled Ugandan presidents Milton Obote and Idi Amin before he captured power in 1986.
